Question: Olproheal Biomimic CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Olproheal

Biomimic CES 2024

 - Taiwan-based medical materials startup
 - Specializes in bioabsorbable medical devices
 - Utilizes biomimicry as core technology
 - Products include OLPROGEL, Schnelgel, Petcongel
 - Located at No. 6, Keya Rd., Daya Dist., Taichung City, Taiwan
Summary_cn:
Olproheal欧赛疗

仿生CES 2024

- 台湾医疗材料初创公司
- 专注于生物可吸收医疗器械
- 采用仿生技术作为核心技术
- 产品包括OLPROGEL、Schnelgel、Petcongel
- 位于台湾台中市大雅区克雅路6号
